text:
I say this bc I don’t want GOP lawmakers to lie to the public & pretend they didn’t see a payment crisis coming. They know & are choosing not to stop it.

Just like they pretended to act surprised when PPP went to the rich instead of mom & pops, when they WROTE the bill that way.

Those who scoff, he scoffs at,but the lowly he favors.

Proverbs 3:34

Worth reading. https://twitter.com/elilake/status/1254048443795898370 QT @EliLake Bret Stephens makes a compelling case for regionally beginning to lift the lockdown. The rest of America doesn’t have to play by New York’s rules. He’s right. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/24/opinion/coronavirus-lockdown.html
About to join @amjoyshow at 10 a.m. ET this morning on @MSNBC to discuss coronavirus and what more Congress can do to help hurting Americans. Be sure to tune in.

Companies have a responsibility to ensure the health & safety of their employees. This latest major outbreak of #COVID19 in an Amazon warehouse in NJ is why I've been calling on the company to take necessary steps to protect its workers. https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-confirms-largest-covid-19-outbreak-at-warehouse-outside-nyc-2020-4

We have a president who doesn't believe in science. Whether it is climate change or the coronavirus pandemic, that is unbelievably dangerous.

Construction was the leading recipient of #PPPloans

#PPP has allowed many construction companies to keep & even add workers despite declining demand

Ridiculous. Who would have predicted California would declare war on skaters AND surfers? Message to Big Government Dems:  You can protect public safety & have reasonable social distancing WITHOUT trampling on individual Liberty & shutting down the outdoors. https://twitter.com/cbs8/status/1254126674662305796 QT @CBS8 At least three people were arrested on Saturday during a protest at Moonlight Beach in Encinitas. If you’re looking for ways to support our frontline workers and are able to do so, please consider donating to coronavirus relief funds like the ones set up by @DomesticWorkers, @FeedingAmerica, and @CDCFound. The only way we’ll get through this is if we do it together.

I want everyone to know that the White House, Mnuchin, McConnell & Congress *know* that there is a housing crisis looming due to inaction on rent + mortgage relief.

If we don’t act ASAP, millions could face foreclosure & eviction.

Dems have plans to stop it. It’s being blocked. https://twitter.com/ddayen/status/1253818412939108354 QT @ddayen This is going to be an enormous problem. The second wave is a foreclosure wave. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWZ1EQDVcAA1BrB.png

More than 200,000 DACA recipients and 130,000 TPS holders are working essential jobs. The last thing they need is to worry about deportation while helping fight this crisis.

@SenatorDurbin and I are pushing the administration to automatically extend their work authorizations.

Ayer, el senador rubio hablo con @cristyonair y @NandyDavila1 de @925MAXIMA sobre el #COVID19
y el #ProgramaDeProtecciónDePagoDeCheques. #NandyYCristy

Thanks @marceelias for explaining why Trump can't change the election. We must start preparing for the November elections now. 

My VoteSafe Act would take the necessary steps to expand early voting and curbside voting to make sure voting is safe.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWZqmkzXkAcNDt6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1253806121778925568/vid/320x320/XTdk_g3KhYZ58jqG.mp4?tag=13

SCOTUS could decide on DACA any week now. These young people deserve to know if their personal information—that our country promised not to use for immigration enforcement—will be used against them.

I’ve been asking this administration that question since January 2017. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWebHilWAAE34vz.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254140804261711874/vid/320x320/PnntU3C19IQO5Mfw.mp4?tag=13

This week I was on Firing Line on @PBS with @MargaretHoover 

I wish we had more shows like this that allow for long form,substantive interviews instead of the daily political back & forth.  

You can watch here:
 https://www.pbs.org/video/marco-rubio-iouga9

Reopening states too soon will come at the risk of losing progress we’ve made in slowing down the spread of coronavirus. 

Here’s a better option: A proactive plan to stop this virus in its tracks—and that includes establishing a nationwide contact tracing program. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWfLcYwXQAomVGd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254193946303102976/vid/320x320/R4mtafQMM8IDommd.mp4?tag=13

RT @RepMarciaFudge The coronavirus is disproportionately infecting and killing minorities across the nation.

I joined @CedricRichmond, @SenKamalaHarris & @SenGaryPeters in demanding FEMA address racial disparities in its response to the pandemic and ensure equitable delivery of aid and assistance. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWYwlSzXQAAnbu1.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWYwlSzXgAM9150.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWYwlS0XsAAsd9w.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWYwlS-WkAQigZE.jpg

Jane and I want to thank every single American on the frontlines of this terrible crisis—doctors, nurses, postal workers, delivery workers, grocery store workers and many more. We must do everything we can to protect essential workers across the country. #SOULSaturday

Our prisons needed reform long before the pandemic, and this crisis is highlighting why. You can’t practice physical distancing in a prison, and incarcerated individuals shouldn’t have to risk their lives in these inhumane conditions. https://time.com/5825388/coronavirus-prisons-jails/

RT @AriFleischer “I don’t see why people living in a Nashville suburb should not be allowed to return to their jobs because people like me choose to live, travel and work in urban sardine cans.” https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/24/opinion/coronavirus-lockdown.html?referringSource=articleShare

It's vital that Congress hears from workers themselves about their experiences on the front lines leading our pandemic response. 

Share your story below and know that I will keep fighting for you as hard as I fight for my own family. #StandWithEssentialWorkers https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1254160753915047936 QT @TeamWarren 🚨 Are you or do you know an essential worker? We want to hear from you!

Tell us what you're seeing on the front lines, what you need to be safe and healthy, or anything you wish your employer or representatives knew about your work during this crisis. ⬇️ https://act.elizabethwarren.com/page/s/essential-workers-story-share?source=soc-PET-team-tw-story-share

It's been clear from the very beginning that he is the hand of the president... instead of the attorney of the people.

The American people deserve a comprehensive solution to vote during the pandemic. I'm proposing $5 billion to:

-Expand vote-by-mail
-Require nationwide early voting for at least 20 days
-Ensure in-person voting is safe and accessible for those who need it
https://www.mic.com/p/kamala-harriss-votesafe-act-calls-for-a-5-billion-investment-in-vote-by-mail-22826829

Hedge funds, private equity firms, & the wealthiest Americans shouldn't be exploiting this crisis for even more tax breaks. I’m glad to join @SenWhitehouse, @SenSherrodBrown, @SenSanders & others on a bill to repeal tax cuts for the rich in the CARES Act. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/24/business/tax-breaks-wealthy-virus.html

On #SOULSaturday, I’m joining @JoeBiden and thanking our essential workers who have always been the backbone of our nation’s response in times of crisis—and that’s even more true during the coronavirus pandemic. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1254103038568140803/img/uU2vXeomW0938_VV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254103038568140803/vid/320x320/vLWx7HMSTFD6TwT9.mp4?tag=13

@NelStamp I am so sorry for your loss, Nelini. I’m in this fight with you and I promise you that I will keep fighting so that Congress will #PutPeopleFirst.

All too often, Native Americans are disenfranchised at the ballot box—this is a victory for Native American voting rights.

In every state across our nation, a Tribal ID and recognition of Tribal street addresses should be sufficient to vote.
https://twitter.com/campaignlegal/status/1253768558242410503 QT @CampaignLegal WONDERFUL news! In response to a lawsuit we filed with @NDNrights & @TQPurdon, we've reached a legally-binding agreement w/ the state of #NorthDakota to help protect the voting rights of Native American voters in the state. A WIN for voting rights! #NDpol https://campaignlegal.org/update/victory-native-american-voting-rights-north-dakota

$282,000,000,000.

That's by how much America’s billionaires increased their wealth in less than a month, while over 22 million lost their jobs.

This system of unfettered greed is morally obscene. It’s time to put working families first—not billionaires. https://www.businessinsider.com/us-billionaire-wealth-increased-since-trump-became-president-2020-4

This is great news for #Texas. After days of Democrats’ delays and petty partisan games, @realDonaldTrump signed much-needed #SmallBizRelief to help struggling small businesses. https://apnews.com/77bcfddcdcc80a249e7def8410d630a8

As I pointed out yesterday,round two of #PPP which starts Monday will move much faster than round one

That’s good news because it means over 2 million #Smallbusinesses & tens of millions of jobs will be saved. 

But also means money will run out faster https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/04/24/small-business-loans-coronavirus/

This is exactly what happens when you let a giant company be both the umpire and a player in the game. @Amazon needs to explain why it misled Congress – and we need to break up Amazon and big tech. https://www.politico.com/news/2020/04/23/democrats-demand-answers-on-whether-amazon-lied-about-data-tactics-205834

Today marks #WorldMalariaDay. As we work to defeat #COVID19, we are minded of the important progress across the globe to #EndMalaria. Sen. Rubio recommits to continue leading the fight against #Malaria and other preventable diseases. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWeoJNPWoAM7mIR.jpg

More than 26 million Americans have become unemployed in the last five weeks. I introduced a bill to eliminate the strict work requirements for food and nutrition assistance. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWe9_4MXsAAE3Eh.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254179630787055617/vid/480x270/YvZQ4RxOw-deBzoM.mp4?tag=13

Millions of families need federal help right now for the food, shelter, income, and health care they need.

The absolute last thing Congress should be doing is shoveling money to boost the profits of arms manufacturers like Lockheed and Raytheon. https://thehill.com/policy/defense/493741-pentagon-eyes-billions-for-defense-firms-in-next-coronavirus-aid-bill

FEMA’s disaster responses have long been plagued by racial and socioeconomic disparities, which could have devastating consequences for our most vulnerable communities during this pandemic. 

I led a letter to FEMA yesterday demanding they transparently address these disparities.

26 million people are unemployed. Frontline workers are wearing garbage bags. But the Pentagon can divert billions to Trump’s racist border wall & nobody blinks an eye. I bet the Pentagon has some money in the couch cushions for masks or tests. Have they tried looking? https://twitter.com/MotherJones/status/1253358068848607232 QT @MotherJones Since the coronavirus crisis first took hold in the US, the Defense Department has received $10.5 billion in emergency funding from Congress. The department is already asking for “billions and billions” in future stimulus funding that Congress considers. https://nytv.to/GMLwV

Thank you, today and every day, for all you do, essential workers. You're keeping an uncertain nation afloat, and you deserve better. That’s exactly what we’re going to keep fighting for. 

Join us on Monday and #StandWithEssentialWorkers. https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1254118659393499139 QT @TeamWarren This Monday, we’re calling on our representatives to #StandWithEssentialWorkers and provide real protections for essential workers.  

Frontline workers are risking their lives for all of us. Join us and demand an Essential Workers Bill of Rights. ➡️ http://ewar.ren/Essential-Work http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWd_XjYWoAAtptH.jpg

Today I’m joining my friend @JoeBiden and people across our nation who are coming together to take part in #SOULSaturday. Let’s use this moment to show our appreciation for those on the front lines and connect with our friends and neighbors. We're all in this together. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWdhhDBXgAMLXLH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254072027566260224/vid/320x320/FNfaDOsSEGv0HD7O.mp4?tag=13

I'm so grateful to be teaming up with @JoeBiden to recognize all of the heroes fighting for us on the front lines.   

The biggest thing you can do today is a small act of kindness for someone else—so please, join us in this day of service. #SOULSaturday http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1254057329865211911/pu/img/ame7oBn_6gLSYbR1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1254057329865211911/pu/vid/320x400/4vv-BWWf3vjosSdJ.mp4?tag=10

Great to see @DeptofDefense feature the incredible work the @FLGuard is doing in partnership with @FIU to prepare to receive #coronavirus patients at the Miami Beach Convention Center. @FLGuard  has been indispensable in #Florida’s fight against #COVID19.

https://www.defense.gov/Explore/Features/Story/Article/2164333/florida-national-guard-university-partner-to-combat-covid-19/source/GovDelivery/
Así como pretendieron estar sorprendidxs cuando el dinero del PPP se fue a los ricos en vez de a los pequeños negocios, cuando ellxs ESCRIBIERON la ley de esa manera.

Lxs Demócratas tienen planes para parar esta crisis pero están siendo bloqueadxs.   

Digo esto xq no quiero q los legisladores Republicanos mientan al público & pretendan q no vieron venir la crisis.  Lo saben & eligen no hacer nada para pararla.

Quiero q todxs sepan q la Casa Blanca, Mnuchin, McConnell & el Congreso *saben* q hay una inminente crisis de vivienda dado a la inacción con respecto al alivio de renta + hipoteca.

Si no actuamos cuanto antes, millones podrían enfrentar ejecuciones de hipoteca & desalojos. https://twitter.com/ddayen/status/1253818412939108354 QT @ddayen This is going to be an enormous problem. The second wave is a foreclosure wave. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWZ1EQDVcAA1BrB.png

Hasta ahora el #EquipoAOC ha llamado a más de 56,000 constituyentes + recaudado más de $300,000 para dispensarios de alimentos & organizaciones. 

Unase a nosotros al: https://www.ocasiocortez.com/events

Nuestra comunidad les agradece a cada unx de ustedes por ser voluntarixs desde casa para asegurarse que todxs estén bien & por contribuir a nuestros esfuerzos de alivio en la comunidad. https://twitter.com/voguemagazine/status/1253746328280150019 QT @voguemagazine The office of New York Congresswoman @AOC has been directly reaching out to constituents in the Bronx and Queens to ask if their basic needs are being met during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://www.vogue.com/article/aoc-office-reaching-out-to-constituents-covid-19?utm_source=twitter&utm_social-type=owned&mbid=social_twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_brand=vogue
